user.title: EcoGuard Configuration
user.description: Enter your EcoGuard credentials to connect to your energy monitoring system.

data.domain: Domain code (e.g., SkrentenBrl - from portal URL)
data.nord_pool_area: Nord Pool Area (optional - e.g., NO1, SE3)

data_description.username: Your EcoGuard username or object number used to log in to the EcoGuard portal.
data_description.domain: Your EcoGuard domain code (e.g., 'SkrentenBrl'). This is typically found in your EcoGuard portal URL or provided by your energy provider.
data_description.nord_pool_area: Your Nord Pool pricing area code (e.g., 'NO1' for Oslo, 'SE3' for Stockholm). This is used for electricity price data. [Find your area on the Nord Pool map]({nord_pool_link}).

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to EcoGuard. Please check your credentials and domain.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid authentication credentials. Please check your username and password.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

abort.already_configured: This EcoGuard domain is already configured.
